In continuation to our Circular, a standardized assessment sheet to judge the suitability of the ex-servicemen during interview is enclosed: All PDs_ PIUs are requested to strictly follow the criteria as per assessment sheet during the selection process, to ensure uniformity, transparency and recording of the assessment by the committee: While issuing interview letters, sponsored ex-servicemen must be asked to the following documents in original and attested/notarised photocopy to verify and form the basis for marking along with financial bids: - 1_ Retired Officer's Identity Card 2 . Pension order (PPO) 3. Retirement Medical Certificate 4. DGR Registration Certificate 5, University Degree 6. Certificate in  support of computer knowledge (questions may be asked during interview to judge the computer knowledge) 7 _ Detail of Present establishment and proof of manpower (last audited balance sheet etc ) 8 .
